comments.author: Eric Belair
comments.message: How do I install this extension?

comments.author: Akbarsait
comments.message:
Download AppCore Creator from here - http://appcorecreator.riaforge.org/.

1. In ColdFusion Builder Select Windows > Show View > Others > ColdFusion > Extensions. This will bring the extension view in your ColdFusion Builder Editor.

2. Select the '+' in Extension view and browse the downloaded Appcore Creator Zip file. Follow the steps and you have done.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
